getAllAuditTransactionsForEntity

public static List<AuditTransaction> getAllAuditTransactionsForEntity(org.hibernate.Session session,
                                                                      AuditType auditType,
                                                                      String externalId)
Return all audit transactions that have the entity modified in any way. The result is sorted in reverse, e.g. the most recent transactions first.

Parameters:
session -
auditType -
externalId -
Returns:

getAllAuditEventsForEntity

public static List<AuditEvent> getAllAuditEventsForEntity(org.hibernate.Session session,
                                                          AuditType auditType,
                                                          String externalId)
Return all audit events that have the entity modified in any way. The result is sorted in asc order, e.g. the oldest entries first.

Parameters:
session -
auditType -
externalId -
Returns:

getAllAuditEventsForEntityUntilTransactionId

public static List<AuditEvent> getAllAuditEventsForEntityUntilTransactionId(org.hibernate.Session session,
                                                                            AuditType auditType,
                                                                            String externalId,
                                                                            Long transactionId)
Return all audit events that have the entity modified in any way until specified transactionId (The transactionId is included). The result is sorted in asc order, e.g. the oldest entries first.

Parameters:
session -
auditType -
externalId -
Returns:
